General.Name: Spectral MD Holdings Ltd
General.Description: Spectral MD Holdings, Ltd., a predictive analytics company, develops AI algorithms and optical technology in wound care treatment. It offers DeepView wound imaging solution, an AI technology and multispectral imaging system that provides healing assessments for burn wounds and diabetic foot ulcers. Spectral MD Holdings, Ltd. was incorporated in 2020 and is headquartered in Dallas, Texas.
General.Address: 2515 Mckinney Avenue, Dallas, TX, United States, 75201
